text:
A quarter of the world may be without the #COVID19 #vaccine until 2022. 

If you're lucky enough to have had your  #vaccination please #PayItForward so that we can keep helping #children in #SouthAfrica until they can have theirs.

Text BST to 70085 to donate £5 today.

#ThankYou https://t.co/jwZQVcFeUh
